title: Mahoutsukai no Yome: Nishi no Shounen to Seiran no Kishi
synopsis: The story takes place shortly before Cartaphilus took a nap and Chise became an auditor at the academy.
voices: ['Tanezaki, Atsumi', 'Takeuchi, Ryouta', 'Uchiyama, Kouki', 'Endou, Aya', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Ohara, Sayaka', 'Yasumoto, Hiroki', 'Ichikawa, Aoi', 'Igarashi, Hiromi']
